general: Today, dear Pisces, your mind and body seem to be evolving on different planes. If your thoughts lead you into deep reflections, it is essential to reconnect with the physical world. The Moon in Virgo creates tensions with Pluto and Mars, making it difficult to let go of certain obsessions. Take the time to explore your ideas, even the craziest ones, as they may contain interesting gems. New opportunities arise, while other projects come to an end. Identify what excites you the most to prepare for the path ahead.
love: Be open to sincere exchanges with your partner, as this will strengthen your bonds.
work: Focus on your innovative ideas, as they could lead to fruitful projects.
health: Don't forget to engage in physical activities to balance your restless mind.
advice: Reconnect with the present to soothe your mind.
teaser: Balance your mind and body today.
